title: {LFP} Serious League of Legends Team (Dynamic Legion) Recruiting coaches/analysts and Top/ADC
body:
Hello guys we are team Dynamic Legion,

Dynamic Legion is a League of legends team that practices on a weekly roster and wants to play tournaments, it is a team that provides a competitive environment for the players. Dynamic Legion has 2 stages an A team and a B team, the A team is already full and only needs a coach and analyst, the B team needs minimal gold 3 TOP and ADC that has a good attitude and non toxic. The players in the B team can also promote to the A team, but both teams are going to play tournaments. In the future we want to make more teams and build our own community. we also have our own discord/teamspeak if you guys want to talk if you are interested you can add my main account: DL Void

replies.body: I am a pretty good adc ;) missfbot add me
